p: SEM of forming biofilms - Ultrastructure of forming biofilms of C. albicans (ATCC MYA-2876), C. tropicalis (ATCC 750) and C. dubliniensis (ATCC MYA-646) in the presence of 0.5, 1.0 and 2.0 mg/mL C. verum leaf oil, chlorhexidine digluconate and Fluconazole was qualitatively evaluated by SEM ( Figs 5, 6, 7).
